languages.text: The next use of {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, when used after {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Entrench{/g}, grants an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
languages.original_text: Следующее использование Стрельбы на бегу после Окопаться предоставляет +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: The next use of Shot on the Run, when used after Ready, Go!, grants an additional +(AGI bonus) movement points.
The next use of Run and Gun, when used after Ready, Go!, grants an additional +AGI bonus movement points.
The next use of Run and Gun, when used after Ready, Go!, grants an additional +AGI bonus movement points.
The next use of Run and Gun, when used after Entrench, grants an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.

languages.text: Следующее использование {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбы на бегу{/g} после {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Окопаться{/g} предоставляет +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно.
languages.original_text: The next use of {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, when used after {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Entrench{/g}, grants an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Следующее использование {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбы на бегу{/g} после {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Окопаться{/g} предоставляет +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно.
Следующее использование Стрельбы на бегу после К бою готов! предоставляет +бонус ЛВК ОП дополнительно.

languages.text: 当士兵在{g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}战壕工事{/g}之后使用{g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}奔袭射击{/g}时，会额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: The next use of {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, when used after {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Entrench{/g}, grants an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当士兵在战壕工事之后使用奔袭射击时，会额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text: El próximo uso de {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Disparo a la carrera{/g} tras utilizar {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Atrincherarse{/g} otorga +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} adicionales.
languages.original_text: The next use of {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, when used after {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Entrench{/g}, grants an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El próximo uso de Disparo en movimiento tras utilizar ¡Preparados, listos, ya! otorga +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} adicionales.

languages.text: Der nächste Einsatz von {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Laufen und ballern{/g}, wenn es nach {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Verschanzen{/g} eingesetzt wird, gewährt zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}.
languages.original_text: The next use of {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, when used after {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Entrench{/g}, grants an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die nächste Verwendung von Laufen und Schießen, falls nach Fertig, los! genutzt, gewährt zusätzlich +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}- {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}.

languages.text: L'utilisation suivante de {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Tir à la volée{/g}, à condition de l'utiliser après {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Ancrer{/g}, confère +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}.
languages.original_text: The next use of {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, when used after {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Entrench{/g}, grants an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisation suivante de Sauve qui Peut !, à condition de l'utiliser après Prêts, partez !, confère +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}.

languages.text: 次にラン＆ガンを使用する際、それが塹壕掘りの後である場合、追加で{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}得る。
languages.original_text: The next use of Run and Gun, when used after Entrench, grants an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 次にラン＆ガンを使用する際、それが塹壕掘りの後である場合、追加で{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}得る。

languages.text: {g|f:f509573bad85478b8f36e6bd97c943e4}Sipere Yat{/g} kabiliyetinin ardından kullanılan bir sonraki {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Fırla ve Mıhla{/g}, ilave +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanı{/g} kazandırır.
